chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: In previous video we saw what are functions

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: and what are the types of functions

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: and we also saw what are string functions and how to use them in SQL

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: In this video we will talk about aggregate functions

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: and then we will see how to use them in SQL

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: Aggregate functions help you to perform calculations

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: You can see that these calculations are performed on multiple values

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: and at last they return a single value

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: and aggregate functions are mostly used

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: with group by statement or select statement

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: so our next topic will be group by statement

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: and next you can see that the most used aggregate functions

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: are count, sum, average, max, minimum and round function

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: count gives you total number of count

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: how many rows are there in your table

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: sum function tells you sum of all values

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: average function tells you average of total values

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: max value tells you maximum value

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: minimum function tells you minimum value

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: and round function helps you to specify decimal places

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: so you can specify all digits after decimal

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: with the help of round function

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: so let's understand it with the help of example

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: so we are in SQL, you can see that I have a table

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: and I have 4 columns

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: count, mode, means by which method you have transferred money

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: and last is payment date

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: so first we will put count

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: so actually count function

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: you can write star here

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: then also it will give you same result

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: or if I want to give name of any column

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: so suppose I will give amount

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: let's run it

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: so you can see that result is 15

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: means it has 15 rows of data

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: if I write star instead of amount

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: it means I need count of all rows in table

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: then also same result will come, 15 should come

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: let's run it

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: you can see 15 is still there

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: so count gives you total number of rows

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: after count we will see sum

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: so here I will write sum

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: and here I will write amount

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: so I want to see sum of column amount

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: how many values are there in total

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: run

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: you can see total values are 720

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: so we have 720 total values

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: which is amount paid

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: now we will talk about maximum

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: and max amount means

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: maximum value in column

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: so maximum value is 90

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: so you can see minimum

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: so you can write min

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: in min function

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: in bracket you can put function

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: column name will come in bracket

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: so minimum value is 10

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: so item will be 10

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: now let's see average

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: for average you have to write

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: avg and amount in bracket

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: run

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: so average is 48

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: if you notice 48.0000

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: means infinite 0

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: so if you want to avoid infinite 0

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: you can see column number

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: is 0

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: and you can't read decimal

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: so it is easier to round off

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: so we will use round function

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: so here you write round

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: and put bracket

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: and comma

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: and how many digits you want

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: so i want only 2

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: so write 2 and close bracket

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: now run

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: so you can see 48.00

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: so you can use aggregate function

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: so this is official page of postgresql

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: for aggregate function

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: so here you can see many functions

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: and they have divided aggregate function in different tables

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: so we use them for general purpose

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: in which we have implemented some functions

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: like count, max, min

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: sum

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: so these are for general purpose

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: so here you can see statistics

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: so they have other functions

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: so i will give you page link

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: so you can use aggregate function

chunks.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL - COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX,
chunks.text: so in this video we will talk about group by and having clause

text: In previous video we saw what are functions and what are the types of functions and we also saw what are string functions and how to use them in SQL In this video we will talk about aggregate functions and then we will see how to use them in SQL Aggregate functions help you to perform calculations You can see that these calculations are performed on multiple values and at last they return a single value and aggregate functions are mostly used with group by statement or select statement so our next topic will be group by statement and next you can see that the most used aggregate functions are count, sum, average, max, minimum and round function count gives you total number of count how many rows are there in your table sum function tells you sum of all values average function tells you average of total values max value tells you maximum value minimum function tells you minimum value and round function helps you to specify decimal places so you can specify all digits after decimal with the help of round function so let's understand it with the help of example so we are in SQL, you can see that I have a table and I have 4 columns count, mode, means by which method you have transferred money and last is payment date so first we will put count so actually count function you can write star here then also it will give you same result or if I want to give name of any column so suppose I will give amount let's run it so you can see that result is 15 means it has 15 rows of data if I write star instead of amount it means I need count of all rows in table then also same result will come, 15 should come let's run it you can see 15 is still there so count gives you total number of rows after count we will see sum so here I will write sum and here I will write amount so I want to see sum of column amount how many values are there in total run you can see total values are 720 so we have 720 total values which is amount paid now we will talk about maximum and max amount means maximum value in column so maximum value is 90 so you can see minimum so you can write min in min function in bracket you can put function column name will come in bracket so minimum value is 10 so item will be 10 now let's see average for average you have to write avg and amount in bracket run so average is 48 if you notice 48.0000 means infinite 0 so if you want to avoid infinite 0 you can see column number is 0 and you can't read decimal so it is easier to round off so we will use round function so here you write round and put bracket and comma and how many digits you want so i want only 2 so write 2 and close bracket now run so you can see 48.00 so you can use aggregate function so this is official page of postgresql for aggregate function so here you can see many functions and they have divided aggregate function in different tables so we use them for general purpose in which we have implemented some functions like count, max, min sum so these are for general purpose so here you can see statistics so they have other functions so i will give you page link so you can use aggregate function so in this video we will talk about group by and having clause
